entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to near valley bottom overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
